meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by the bacterium Chlamydia.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed antibiotics for the chlamydial infection.
meanings.sent2: She learned about the chlamydial bacteria in her science class.
meanings.sent3: The chlamydial bacteria threw a party inside the body, causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The chlamydial invasion in the body was like an uninvited guest disrupting a peaceful gathering.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the chlamydial organisms multiplying rapidly.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the sexually transmitted infection chlamydia.
meanings.sent1: He went for a check-up after suspecting a chlamydial transmission.
meanings.sent2: The nurse provided information on preventing chlamydial infections.
meanings.sent3: The chlamydial infection decided to take a vacation at the worst possible time.
meanings.sent4: The chlamydial outbreak in the community spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of ignoring chlamydial risks were severe.
